item.title: Building a Memex
item.description: This was originally posted on my newsletter. A few weeks ago I came across this tweet from Linus, better known as @thesephist: NEW PROJECT — I made a "personal search engine" that lets me search all my blogs, tweets, journals, notes, contacts, & more at once 🚀 It's called Monocle, and features a full text search system written in Ink 👇 GitHub ⌨️ https://t.co/XWtiCr5CmZ Demo 🔍 https://t.co/8nhS8M3Du3 pic.twitter.com/rfurqpmaXc — Linus (@thesephist) July 8, 2021 Over a weekend, Linus collected a bunch of his personal data (blog posts, tweets, journal entries, etc.
